text: The Adjutant of His Excellency () is a 1969 Soviet movie directed by Yevgeny Tashkov.«Больше не проживу». Две внезапные смерти в судьбе режиссера «Майора Вихря»АДЪЮТАНТ ЕГО ПРЕВОСХОДИТЕЛЬСТВА (1969) It stars Yury Solomin, Vladislav Strzhelchik, and Vladimir Kozel. ==Actors== *Yury Solomin as Pavel Andreevich Koltsov *Vladislav Strzhelchik as Lieutenant-General Vladimir Zenonovich Kovalevsky *Vladimir Kozel as Colonel Nikolay G. Shchukin *Tatiana Ivanitskaya as Tanya Shchukina, daughter of Colonel Shchukin *Alexander Milokostiy as Yura, son of Colonel Lvov *Anatoli Papanov as Yevgeny Angel *Victor Pavlov as Miron Osadchy == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1969 movies Category:Movies directed by Yevgeny Tashkov
title: The Adjutant of His Excellency
